nodes.text: The Borleias Operations was a branch of the Galactic Alliance Defense Force based on the Borleias outpost and tasked to vigilate to the frontier with the Imperial Remnant after the Second Galactic Civil War; it was considered a boring assignment and usually was used for officer and soldiers which made some mistake in their career; at the 44 ABY was commanded by the General Eldo Davip, who sided with Jacen in the civil war.
